entitymodel.title: Entity of an Apache OFBiz Component

entity.title: Product Catalog Inventory Facility Applicability Entity

view-entity.title: Product And ProductCategoryMember View Entity
ProductCategory And ProductCategoryMember View Entity
ProductCategoryContent, Content and DataResource View Entity

field.name: comments
field.description: Internal comments, not for public display.

field.name: sequenceNum
field.description: This field is used to sort the links. The linkSeqId field is not used because it is part of the primary key and cannot be changed.

field.name: detailSubScreen
field.description: This is optional. If not specified a default should be used by the category detail template.

view-entity.title: ProductCategoryMember And ProductCategoryRole View Entity

field.name: parentProductCategoryId
field.description: The parent category; it should be one of productCategoryId already setup in ProductCategory or ProductCategoryRollup

view-entity.title: ProductCategoryRollup And ProductCategoryRole View Entity
view-entity.description: Allow the lookup of a category that is in another category that a party/role is related to. So, the party/role is related to the parent category.

view-entity.title: Product Config And Product View Entity, to be able to see which products use a certain configuration item

entity.title: Product Configuration Question Data Object Entity

field.name: configIactnTypeId
field.description: INCOMPATIBLE, etc...

entity.title: Product Configuration Option to Products Entity

field.name: configTypeId
field.description: HIDDEN, TEMPLATE, etc...

field.name: cost
field.description: Higher precision in case it is a calculated number

view-entity.title: Container and Geo Point View Entity

field.name: defaultDaysToShip
field.description: In the absence of a product specific days to ship in ProductFacility, this will be used

field.name: defaultDimensionUomId
field.description: This field store the unit of measurement of dimension (length, width and height)

relation.description: this was changed from the FK to better handle syncronization; this may be set back to be a FK in the future

view-entity.title: Facility and Contact Mech View Entity

entity.title: Facility Location Geo Location with history

view-entity.title: Facility Location and Geo Point View Entity
Facility Content Detail View Entity

field.name: lastInventoryCount
field.description: This field represents availableToPromiseTotal of a product at a certain point of time and is being updated regularly by a schedule service every hour

view-entity.title: Product Facility And Contactmech And Postal Address View Entity, to be able to list products by geographic location
ProductFacilityLocation Quantity Test View Entity
ProductFacilityLocation And FacilityLocation View Entity
ProductFeature And ProductFeatureAppl View Entity

entity.title: Product Category Feature Group Application Entity

view-entity.title: Product Feature Group And Applicability View Entity
ProductFeatureGroupAppl And ProductFeatureAppl View Entity
Balance Inventory Items View Entity

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: The owner of the inventory item.

field.name: unitCost
field.description: Higher precision in case it is a calculated number

field.name: currencyUomId
field.description: The currency Uom of the unit cost.

view-entity.title: InventoryItem And FacilityLocation View Entity
Inventory Item Detail Summary View Entity
Inventory Item And Inventory Item Detail for Summation View Entity

alias.name: effectiveDate
alias.description: For query only, not in fields to select.

alias.name: orderId
alias.description: For query only, not in fields to select.

alias.name: ownerPartyId
alias.description: For query only, not in fields to select.

alias.name: quantityOnHandDiff
alias.description: For query only, not in fields to select.

alias.name: accountingQuantityDiff
alias.description: For query only, not in fields to select.

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: Used to track a changed (new) ownerPartyId as a status changes.

field.name: productId
field.description: Used to track a changed (new) productId as a status changes. In other words over time the item may be represented by a different Product (like new versus refurbished).

view-entity.description: This view-entity is for querying a count (findCountByCondition) of InventoryItems that were in a certain status at a certain point in time.

alias.name: productId
alias.description: Note that this is from the status entity because it may change over time.

view-entity.title: PhysicalInventory and InventoryItemVariance View Entity

field.name: termUomId
field.description: Mainly used for recurring and usage prices to specify a time/freq measure, or a usage unit measure (bits, minutes, etc)

field.name: customPriceCalcService
field.description: Points to a CustomMethod used to specify a service for the calculation of the unit price of the product (NOTE: a better name for this field might be priceCalcCustomMethodId)

field.name: priceWithoutTax
field.description: Always without tax if populated, regardless of if price does or does not include tax.

field.name: priceWithTax
field.description: Always with tax if populated, regardless of if price does or does not include tax.

field.name: taxInPrice
field.description: If Y the price field has tax included for the given taxAuthPartyId/taxAuthGeoId at the taxPercentage.

entity.title: Product Price Automatic Notice History Entity

view-entity.title: GoodIdentification and Product View Entity

field.name: primaryProductCategoryId
field.description: The primary category ; it should be one of the productCategoryId already setup in ProductCategoryMember

field.name: quantityIncluded
field.description: If you have a six-pack of 12oz soda cans you would have quantityIncluded=12, quantityUomId=oz, piecesIncluded=6.

field.name: fixedAmount
field.description: Use this for products which are sold in fixed denominations, such as gift certificates or calling cards.

field.name: shippingWeight
field.description: The shipping weight of the product.

field.name: virtualVariantMethodEnum
field.description: This field defines the method of selecting a variant from the selectable features on the virtual product. Either as a variant explosion which will work to about 200 variants or as feature explosion which almost has no limits

field.name: reservMaxPersons
field.description: maximum number of persons who can rent this asset at the same time

field.name: reserv2ndPPPerc
field.description: percentage of the end price for the 2nd person renting this asset connected to this product

field.name: reservNthPPPerc
field.description: percentage of the end price for the Nth person renting this asset connected to this product

field.name: configId
field.description: Used to safe the persisted configuration Id for AGGREGATED products.

field.name: lotIdFilledIn
field.description: Indicate if the lotId must be informed

field.name: orderDecimalQuantity
field.description: use to indicate if decimal quantity can be ordered for this product. Default value is Y

view-entity.title: Product and ProductAssoc View Entity

field.name: sequenceNum
field.description: a product may have several parties associated to it with the same role; this field can be used to define the order of parties associated to the product in that role

view-entity.title: ProductContent, Content and DataResource View Entity
View entity joining Product and InventoryItem to allow queries for InventoryItem based on product attributes

field.name: productMeterTypeId
field.description: Part of the primary key as different meters on a machine should have distinct types

field.name: meterUomId
field.description: Is on this entity instead of the ProductMeterType entity for more flexibility; for example being able to find all speedometers regardless of their primary unit

field.name: defaultUomId
field.description: This is optional and if applicable can describe the meter better

entity.title: Product Maintenance Entity
entity.description: This is used to specify the details for scheduled maintenance.

field.name: maintTemplateWorkEffortId
field.description: Template of Maintenance Plan. WorkEffort may have WorkEffortAssocs for tasks/breakdown detailes

field.name: intervalUomId
field.description: UOM for intervalQuantity; if used intervalMeterTypeId is generally not used (ie one or the other)

field.name: intervalMeterTypeId
field.description: Meter Type for intervalQuantity; if used intervalUomId is generally not used (ie one or the other)

field.name: repeatCount
field.description: If 0 or null means no limit to repeat count; can be used with multiple ProductMaint records for a single ProductMaintType in cases where maintenance intervals are not evenly distributed, or only need to be done once like a break-in period

relation.title: Interval
relation.description: This can't have a foreign key because the intervalMeterTypeId field is optional, but the productId field is not

entity.title: Product Maintenance Type Entity
entity.description: This is for both scheduled and unscheduled maintenance; use ProductMaint to track details for scheduled maintenance

view-entity.title: Virtual and Associated Product Prices View Entity
view-entity.description: When using this to get an associated product price summary the only columns you should request are: productId, productName, assocProductCount, assocMinPrice, assocMaxPrice. The rest of the field aliases should only be used for specifying constraints since they will break the grouping.

view-entity.title: Virtual and Variant Product View Entity
Product And Price View

entity.description: For information related to a specific vendor and product, especially for multi-vendor stores. The ProductStoreGroup is to be used much like in ProductPrice.

view-entity.title: Product Promotion Email and Party View Entity
Product Promotion Use Check View Entity

field.name: payToPartyId
field.description: Note that this corresponds with the organizationPartyId that GL transactions will be posted to.

field.name: isImmediatelyFulfilled
field.description: If immediately fulfilled (for physical stores, etc): don't send email notices, don't reserve inventory, and IFF inventory info isn't found on the server then don't issue inventory right away

field.name: balanceResOnOrderCreation
field.description: If set to Y, when a new sales order is created with backordered items, then reservations on the facility/product are reassigned according to the priority given by the shipBeforeDate field.

field.name: storeCreditAccountEnumId
field.description: Specify the type (Billing Account or Financial Account) of Store Credit Account used for refund return. Default to Financial Account. This field is override by ReturnHeader.billingAccountId or ReturnHeader.finAccountId, whichever is specified but if only finAccountId is specified explicitly then system will first try to locate any billing account with -ve amount. If found, then amount is credit to this billing account else the amount will be credit to the financial account of the user.

field.name: autoInvoiceDigitalItems
field.description: Default Y. Invoice digital items when order is placed rather than waiting for completing order items (though shipment/fulfillment).

field.name: reqShipAddrForDigItems
field.description: Default Y. Require Shipping Address for Digital Items? Note this only has an effect if there are ONLY digital goods in the cart.

field.name: showTaxIsExempt
field.description: default Y; if set to N do not show isExempt checkbox for PartyTaxAuthInfo, always force to N

field.name: enableAutoSuggestionList
field.description: The auto-suggestion list is a special ShoppingList that the addSuggestionsToShoppingList service will maintain for cross-sells of ordered items.

field.name: prodSearchExcludeVariants
field.description: default Y; if set to Y an additional constraint will of isVariant!=Y will be added to all product searches for the store

field.name: autoOrderCcTryExp
field.description: For auto-orders try other Credit Card expiration dates (if date is wrong or general failure where type not known)?

field.name: autoOrderCcTryOtherCards
field.description: For auto-orders try other Credit Cards for the customer?

field.name: autoOrderCcTryLaterNsf
field.description: For auto-orders if Credit Cards fails for NSF (Not Sufficient Funds) try again later?

field.name: autoOrderCcTryLaterMax
field.description: For auto-orders if Credit Cards fails for NSF try again how many times?

field.name: storeCreditValidDays
field.description: How many days that store credit is valid for. Null value implies no expiration.

field.name: autoApproveInvoice
field.description: If Y or empty, sales invoices created from orders will be marked ready.

field.name: autoApproveOrder
field.description: If N, orders will not be automatically approved when payment is authorized.

field.name: shipIfCaptureFails
field.description: If N, the captureOrderPayments will cause a service error if credit card capture fails.

field.name: setOwnerUponIssuance
field.description: If Y or empty, set the inventory item owner upon issuance.

field.name: reqReturnInventoryReceive
field.description: Default N. This is the default value for the ReturnHeader.needsInventoryReceive field. If set to Y return will automatically go to the Received status when Accepted instead of waiting for actual receipt of the return.

field.name: addToCartRemoveIncompat
field.description: Default N. If Y then on add to cart remove all products in cart with a ProductAssoc record related to or from the product and with the PRODUCT_INCOMPATABLE type.

field.name: addToCartReplaceUpsell
field.description: Default N. If Y then on add to cart remove all products in cart with a ProductAssoc record related from the product and with the PRODUCT_UPGRADE type.

field.name: splitPayPrefPerShpGrp
field.description: Default N. If Y then before the order is stored the OrderPaymentPreference record will be split, one for each OrderItemShipGroup.

field.name: managedByLot
field.description: If Y, the preparator can choose the InventoryItem by this lotId when he makes the picklist.

field.name: showOutOfStockProducts
field.description: Default Y. If N then out of stock products will not be displayed on site

field.name: orderDecimalQuantity
field.description: use to indicate if decimal quantity can be ordered for this producStore. Default value is Y

field.name: allowComment
field.description: Allow comments for order line items per store

field.name: bodyScreenLocation
field.description: if empty defaults to a screen based on the emailType

field.name: xslfoAttachScreenLocation
field.description: if specified is used to generate XSL:FO that is transformed to a PDF via Apache FOP and attached to the email

entity.title: Allows financial account, such as gift certificate or calling cards, to be configured at store level

field.name: validateGCFinAcct
field.description: determines whether the store should validate gift card numbers against the gift certificate codes stored in FinAccount. Set to N if using external gift card provider.

field.name: accountCodeLength
field.description: length of auto-generated account code

field.name: pinCodeLength
field.description: length of auto-generated pin code, if it is required

field.name: accountValidDays
field.description: number of days an account of this type would be valid for

field.name: authValidDays
field.description: number of days an authorization of this type would be valid for

field.name: purchaseSurveyId
field.description: This survey is typically used to collect information such as name of buyer, recipient, email, message, etc. and is quite flexible

field.name: purchSurveySendTo
field.description: Field name on the purchase survey with the send to email address

field.name: purchSurveyCopyMe
field.description: Whether the BCC on ProductStoreEmailSetting should be copied for email notifications

field.name: replenishMethodEnumId
field.description: Replenish Method for Replenish Account. Can be FARP_TOP_OFF or FARP_REPLENISH_LEVEL. Default FARP_TOP_OFF.

entity.title: Product Store Inventory Facility Applicability Entity

view-entity.title: Product Store Facility By Order

entity.title: Product Store Inventory Facility Applicability Entity

view-entity.title: Product Store Promotion and Applicability View Entity

field.name: manualOnly
field.description: If set to Y then the promotion is not automatically evaluated, but only if it is manually added to the cart.

entity.title: Product Store Carrier Shipment Method Entity

view-entity.title: Product Store Carrier And Shipment Method Type View Entity

entity.title: Product Store Vendor Payment Entity
entity.description: Used to define payments that a vendor related to the store will accept (for multi-vendor stores)

field.name: creditCardEnumId
field.description: If not applicable for the paymentMethodTypeId, use "_NA_"

entity.title: Product Store Vendor Shipment Entity
entity.description: Used to define Carrier-ShipmentMethod combinations that a vendor related to the store will accept (for multi-vendor stores)

field.name: allowProductStoreChange
field.description: Allow change of ProductStore for this WebSite (webapp). Defaults to N (no).

field.name: hostedPathAlias
field.description: For WebSites hosted on webapp using the WebSiteFilter, indicates the path this WebSite will be hosted on

field.name: isDefault
field.description: If Y then it is default WebSite

field.name: displayMaintenancePage
field.description: If set to Y, redirect user to site maintenance page

field.name: maxLifeTime
field.description: The length in time of the subscription

field.name: useTime
field.description: The length of time this subscription can be used

field.name: automaticExtend
field.description: If this subscription is automatically extended with the same period as the initial period.

field.name: canclAutmExtTime
field.description: The time period (before the end of the thruDate) after which the automatic extension of the subscription will be executed.

field.name: canclAutmExtTimeUomId
field.description: Unit Of Measure used for the automatic extension of the subscription.

field.name: gracePeriodOnExpiry
field.description: The time period (after the end of the thruDate) after which the subscription will be expired.

field.name: gracePeriodOnExpiryUomId
field.description: Unit Of Measure used for the grace period of the subscription.

field.name: communicationEventId
field.description: now replaced by entity: SubscriptionCommEvent

field.name: maxLifeTime
field.description: The length in time of the (extended) subscription

field.name: automaticExtend
field.description: If this subscription is automatically extended with the same period as the initial period.

field.name: canclAutmExtTime
field.description: The time period (before the end of the thruDate) after which the automatic extension of the subscription will be executed.

field.name: canclAutmExtTimeUomId
field.description: Unit Of Measure used for the automatic extension of the subscription.

field.name: gracePeriodOnExpiry
field.description: The time period (before the end of the thruDate) after which the automatic extension of the subscription will be executed.

field.name: gracePeriodOnExpiryUomId
field.description: Unit Of Measure used for the automatic extension of the subscription.

field.name: expirationCompletedDate
field.description: The date when expiration completed.

relation.description: No foreign key because we want to optionally be able to have a partyId without the other fields.
Note that foreign key not needed because there is an fk for OrderItem.

field.name: contentId
field.description: Optional (use if applicable) ID of a Content record that this would represent a subscription to.

field.name: webSiteId
field.description: Optional (use if applicable) ID of a WebSite record that this would represent a subscription to.

field.name: serviceNameOnExpiry
field.description: Name of service which will run on subscription expiration.

view-entity.title: Subscription And Communication Event View Entity
Supplier-product and product antityview for purchase order entry
